casebody.data:
John AVERY, et al.
v.
Luis MEDINA, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 18, 2017

Luis Medina, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Shelley E. Harms, in opposition.

The defendants' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn.App. 507, 163 A.3d 1271 (2017), is denied.
